website_summaries.verdict: The Turtle Beach Stealth 300 gaming headset features a built-in amp with four EQ settings to let you tweak your otherwise very simple 3.5mm wired listening experience.
pros: Strong sound performance with solid high-mids and highs
EQ presets offer some flexibility in sound
cons: Internal battery needs to be charged for headset to work

customer_reviews.title: Solid headset but ever so slightly disappointed with sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed headset but I cannot understand why they have a PS4/XB 1mode since it seems to work with my XB1 regardless of the setting?! Construction: excellent. Sound : Very good, but the gunshots in Destiny 2 seem tinny compared to my old headset (Turtle Beach XO One Amplified Stereo Gaming Headset). Comfort: 4/5 - since after a while, you'll need to take them off if only to give your ears some relief from the tight fit (that really muffles exterior noises eg the wifey/TV blah, blah, blah, :D). A word of warning, you cannot connect this directly to the XB1 controller without the audio connector (* purchase separately *).
customer_reviews.author: Err1

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound quality perfect for gaming as background noise is cancelled out. So much so that my son doesn’t hear me calling.The headphones are easily adjusted and very comfortable so ideal for long game play etc. I have bought several cheaper sets of headphones during the last couple of years and these do appear better made only time will tell but the extra cost was worth it for the sound quality alone
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Steadman

customer_reviews.title: It’s terrible
customer_reviews.text: I hate this headset every time I wear it I have to check if it has charge to start with is it doesn’t I have to be sat next to the wall charging because if it’s plugged into my Xbox it makes a terrible buzz for me and my friends also the wire for the charging is tiny. My ears start to kill after 20 minutes of wearing the thing its not comfortable and the multiple wires on the left cause my ear to be dragged down making it more annoying and uncomfortable to play with
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Two pairs failed.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one, then a second pair of these for ps4. Unfortunately both failed and were returned. Saddened as I thought that upgrading from a twenty quid headset would prove worthwhile. Great returns policy from amazon though. Perhaps there is a bad batch as both failed exactly the same (microphone stop working and was noisy for other users)
customer_reviews.author: Martin Slater

customer_reviews.title: Total disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Well I love my old turtle beach head set that I let my son have as his broke, so thought id buy another from the brand as the others I have a floor less from the brand, These sound great apart from the fact when u want to turn the mic volume down it does not work you have to turn off the game volume aswell so these do not work as intended so sending back for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Steve mcca

customer_reviews.title: Read before you buy!
customer_reviews.text: Fairly disappointed with this purchase. Having purchased previous Turtle Beach headphones in years past, I had high expectations of this set. What I've found is a sleak looking headset, not overly comfortable, far too much bass (great if you're intending on jamming out) and one that fails miserably in helping you determine the direction of your enemy (which the x12's did masterfully). Generally, you would assume a brand gets better with age; but, I'm not so sure with Turtle Beach and would have serious reservations about ever buying from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Donjamin

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Great surround sound in games, party chat is extremely good, comfy, brilliant quality and the headband is extremely durable. Flip up mic is a really nice and convenient feature. I would definitely recommend this headset for anyone who's looking for a great mic with not such a steep price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Willetts

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm used to very high quality headphones, these are good and I like the swinging arm mute function however I find from time to time that there can be a high amount of amplified contact noise when adjusting (which could be avoided with a simple time delay), plus I find that the mic will every so often (even when muted), give a little bit of feedback (so that it looks like I'm talking when I'm not, which can be frustrating at times, however this is very minor and infrequent.
customer_reviews.author: Tama

customer_reviews.title: Good so far. Review pending
customer_reviews.text: I have had many headsets over the years gaming but always seem to come back to turtle beach. This is an upgrade from my current budget set. Instantly you can tell they are a much more premium set, chunkier but really light at the same time! the headband adjustment has an integrated metal reinforcement so there is zero chance that the ear cups will break away. Polymer plastic finished in mat black and extra padding alround. They feel really good. The sound is good, three modes for all different types of entertainment, gaming, movies or music. Havent used the integrated mic yet but im sure it will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: handsome

customer_reviews.title: Buy Kraken’s instead!
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality and mic quality were fantastic initially. Then after less than a month they started making a horrendous noise for both me and the people I was playing with (crackling sound, a bit like being outside in wind). I called amazon and got them to replace this first set, thinking it was just an oddity... Second set arrived, and less than a month later here we are again - in exactly the same position with exactly the same defect. Clearly a floored product with no longevity in mind. I’ve moved to a pair of Kraken tournament edition headphones which will hopefully be more up to the task
customer_reviews.author: Owen Lewis Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: The build quality of these are really good. You can feel they put in good components into these headphones. The cans block out a lot of external noise which is great but as my wife found out that means I’m shouting as I can’t hear my own voice. Only 4 stars because I can’t quite get the settings right for when I’m playing with friends and the difference between the game volume and chat volume. When playing solo you can really hear all around you.
customer_reviews.author: Darren A

customer_reviews.title: Decent headset at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I've held off reviewing these until I'd given them a thorough field test. Previous set was Turtle-beach XO Three - a great headset in it's own right. The amplifier help boost sound depth and power while retaining the detail. Positional audio feels a little more precise and the NC mic is great (according to team mates. Charge seems to last for ages (only charged twice since purchase) and they are comfortable, even on those 4 - 5 hour sessions. Definitely worth a look if you can't justify / afford a pro level headset
customer_reviews.author: Jillgaz

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable, poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a pair of wired headphones which need charging before. You'd think that the battery life would be reasonable, but it only lasts for a couple of hours after a full night's charge. The mic is poor quality, but that is to be expected at this price. The cable to connect to your device, however, is unbelievably short. I have to crane my neck when I plug them into my desktop speaker next to the monitor. This makes for incredibly tedious and uncomfortable gaming. Speaking of comfort, these headphones are incredibly tight on the head, and the earpads are too small. The controls on the headphones are small and fiddly. The sound quality is fine, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Bought a pair from the warehouse, crackly sound.  DO NOT BUY THESE ONES
customer_reviews.text: Bought a used pair. No instructions or USB lead in the box, plugged them in and turned on, just crackling and static. Tried them in a PC/PS4 and Xbox One and cracking over the earphones in all cases. Back you go. Just make sure not to pick this pair up when they try and sell them again.
customer_reviews.author: A Basingstoke Man

customer_reviews.title: Meh is the best description
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because the other Turtle Beach headset stopped working. Battery life is average, inference noise is a problem when charging and gaming at the same time. Always need to remember to leave it plugged in to overnight. Power/Selector switch is stupid because of the PS4 and Xbox settings on either side of the OFF position. And they cracked when I adjusted them to fit my head... poor quality materials or I my head is slightly bigger than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Wilbur Seymore

customer_reviews.title: Dont even
customer_reviews.text: Dont even bother to waste your money. Firstly I didnt even know I had to charge it separately, even though its wired!!! The battery life is terrible. My friends could hardly hear me, but others said I was too loud. Tried to return and refund them and it wont let me!!! I go to speak to someone and apparently no one is available. £40 is a lot to lose regardless.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Just bad
customer_reviews.text: I've had many headsets and never had a wired headset need charging. It doesn't have a good battery life and I'm wondering why you wouldn't just a get a wireless headset. Why this headset which is wired needs charging is beyond me but I thought the whole point of a wired headset or anything wired is not having to charge it so this headset was a big waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Issues with using on X Box
customer_reviews.text: Having bought this for my grandson for christmas he was very excited about it. However, he found issues with it after a while where he wasn't being heard on games. After contacting the manufacturer and doing tests, they advised me to contact Amazon to replace it which, to Amazons credit, was done instantly. However, within a couple of weeks of the new one coming, he experienced similar issues, only this time it was purely when he was using his Xbox. Looking at a different manufacturer now for a replacement
customer_reviews.author: Mr David Robson

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: after a couple of weeks of intermittent short use the headset has started to crackle and echo like crazy. sounds like a lose connection with the crackling and I've no idea what's causing the echo, it does it when ever it feels like it and stops in the same faasion. Sent back after it was progressively getting worse and worse.
customer_reviews.author: Lee C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sound.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Value for your money. Purchased these for my teenage son who uses them on his play station he said there perfect. These were my 2nd pair as sadly the 1st pair were faulty. Got replacement the next day. Unbelievable great service. 2nd pair perfect. My son has used them every day. Would definitely recommend these for great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Ju Essex

customer_reviews.title: RECON 200 WIRED HEADSET
customer_reviews.text: This review is SPECIFICALLY FOR THE RECON 200 WIRED. Amazon is putting reviews for all the different headsets on this page. This mic was a pretty BAD decision for me. I bought it then realised you had to charge it. I have never experienced a wired headset that you need to charge. Also the cable for the thing broke within a month and you can’t just replace the cable . Apart from these two things the sound quality is INCREDIBLE and the headset is very very comfy and sits nice even on top of my glasses. I am still upset with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: GD

customer_reviews.title: don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Had these headphones for roughly 3 weeks now and the speakers are on the way out.. They started randomly making a loud popping noise (which nearly blew my eardrums by the way) even when not plugged in.. you can hear it in the video and the volume has a mind of its own. also the mic barely picks up your voice so you have to shout which is not ideal if you have a young family.. Would NOT reccomend
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Cruickshanks

customer_reviews.title: Not practical
customer_reviews.text: Wired headphones with rechargeable batteries? What a nonsense - you need to recharge them in order to use although they are wired! It is not mentioned anywhere in product description! It was a gift and cannot return since 14 days past. First and last item from Turtle Beach
customer_reviews.author: suntoucher

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: **** NEW REVIEW!! **** Below you can see my previous review and how annoyed I felt at the time. I would like to update my review as amazing have worked wonders and got me a fresh head set Just used them for the first time and the audio is great! The mic is clear. All round very happy *Old review* headsets looks great. But.. MIC does not work- straight from the box. It’s registers on my console that I have a mic plugged in. But it doesn’t pick up noise, not even fussy noises. I’ve been through the tech support from turtle beach and that hasn’t helped either Very disappointed as was very excited to use these
customer_reviews.author: Adam Pynegar

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good, battery is good too I use my with PS4 through the controller jack - both ear pieces have sound, the volume control on back of left ear is handy to control sound without going into options and the mic is good (no complaints from people I play with)
customer_reviews.author: Fateous487

customer_reviews.title: Less than 18 months and already deteriorating!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t let charging it put you off. I’ve had it for months and only given it one full charge, maybe two. Update 17 months on from purchase: My speaker output is bleeding into my mic input. I can see when friends talk in the chat that my microphone is echoing. Also I have been told to turn my TV down when I use a monitor with no speakers - so this would mean my headset output is bleeding into my microphone input. This headset is on 17 months old, for £67 (what I paid) I expect longer lasting performance. I’ve had £20 headsets last longer than this.
customer_reviews.author: David Harris

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed about the quality of this headset. I thought Turtle Beach produced decent quality but we had two of these and both broke within a few weeks. The plastic on the adjuster broke on both at the same place. It is too weak and these are not of satisfactory quality. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: G. P. Rowson

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son, he seems happy enough with the product and I can easily say once those headphones are in use, I can be in his room trying to have a conversation with him and he is none of the wiser I'm there until he sees me, so I'm guessing the noise cancelation is good quality
customer_reviews.author: ItsMe84

customer_reviews.title: Buy the older gen mic
customer_reviews.text: They're nice and fit tight and comfy around the ears but the top part can be a little restricting even at it's loosest. Another thing is worth noting is the length of the wire is drastically smaller compared to the previous generation and I have been told the quality of the older generation mic from this brand has as well as a longer wirer but also better mic quality. I suppose all and all not bad mic but it seems they downgraded a bit sadly to say.
customer_reviews.author: marion stanton

customer_reviews.title: Build quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my 6th set from turtle beach now they all break why they still use the cheap plastic to build them im not going to lie the sound is great but i have yet to make it through a year without them breaking and having to replace them . At first thought i might be a bit heavy handed but no iv treated this last set like they were a baby been extra carefull and 6 months in they break , will never spend another penny with turtle beach there are plenty of other good heasets out there . Good luck
customer_reviews.author: Neil c

customer_reviews.title: Beats the 700 stealth hands down ..
customer_reviews.text: So far so good , this is a replacement for the 700 stealth I had at half the price ! It’s the best headset I’ve had so far !! Which just proves the top dollar model isn’t always the best ...
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value for money - high quality too!
customer_reviews.text: Great bang for buck! For the price range these are fantastic for gaming. Only challenge is remembering to flip them off after finishing playing as they will continue to stay on even if you turn the controller and console off. Great sound quality and the mic is great as well. Bargain
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality, good battery life for longer gamin sessions. Bit of a tight fit although they are adjustable, the headband inst particularity flexible but it does give a snug and steady fit without sliding or re adjusting.
customer_reviews.author: Danni Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This headset is very comfortable. It has comfy, soft leather on the earpieces, and padding for the top of the head. the mic switches itself off when stowed up by the head strap. the mic if very high quality and clear and does a good job of not picking up breathing noise. The sound quality is very good too, and sounds are directional, making locating enemies in rng games easy. Would recommend this headset!
customer_reviews.author: Fred William

customer_reviews.title: Had them 6 days. Charged once. Faulty
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on 21st April 2020. 27th April, loud crackling noise through headset and through voice chat. Microphone problem. Not impressed. Going by Google searches, this is a common problem. Turtle Beach were quick to reply to my problems with it. They told me how to check the issue (plug it into phone/tablet and do a recording). I emailed back with my findings and not a peep from them. Returned for refund
customer_reviews.author: Sassenach35

customer_reviews.title: Recon 200 Black Xbox One
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfortable and great sound quality for the price, only issue I seem to have is the microphone not picking up sound very well with my third party wired Xbox controller. But I would put that down to the controller rather than the headset. Would recommend if you’re a casual gamer and don’t wanna splash a few hundred like me!
customer_reviews.author: DanniGozz

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this headset the white and purple are really cute only thing is I hate how the mic isn’t adjustable to how you want it to be, it’s quite high and not close to the mouth so you have to speak up.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela de Leça

customer_reviews.title: Great headset, but doesn't last as long as you would hope.
customer_reviews.text: The headset is great and worked well, but only for one year. The one side stopped working and the warranty is only for one year and it broke after one year and a few days!
customer_reviews.author: LO

customer_reviews.title: fantastic quality,look great too
customer_reviews.text: son loves these,fantastic quality and they look great too..i would definitely recommend this product if you are looking for quality(you do have to charge them just incase you weren't sure)
customer_reviews.author: Lee Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound
customer_reviews.text: These where bought for a frien for his xbox one. He tells me the sound is fantastice and he sounds good on the other end too. Great price Value for money
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Has to be charged
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift but have been told it's not the best for the money paid. Not great that it has to be charged unlike other headsets that can just be plugged straight into controller. Good otherwise though
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: 5⭐ quality product! 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my son and he was thrilled with them. He said they were very comfortable to wear and offered excellent sound quality. All in all this is a great high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Barrie36

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headset around October time not knowing much about headsets but I went for this one because it was decently priced and had many features. Ever since it’s arrival it’s been superb to use and has not had any issues whatsoever since then as I’m writing this in May. So this would be a great headset for gaming especially on Xbox and PS4 (As I have both).
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Not happy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is ok but not happy with the fact you have to charge the headset up and if you forget to turn them off you end up charging them every use... my old turtle beach just plugged into the controller and worked like any headset should!! Was going to send them back but threw the box so stuck with them until I find another set I don’t have to charge up to use 😞
customer_reviews.author: d woods

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: I had the old turtle beach ear force which were excellent sound but sadly snapped an ear part. These are excellent sound quality and robustly built, very comfortable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bucko

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for gaming, needs charging and I forget but it has great quality all round. I've bought a few but this one's seems the best out of them all.
customer_reviews.author: lucy cottam

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Work brilliant sound is brilliant only thing you need to know is that you have to charge them for 3 hours . You do get alot of houre use out of them well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable as soon as you put them on
customer_reviews.text: These are heavy, feel cheaply made, are way too bass heavy and they're far too small for an (admittedly) slightly larger adult head. Unless you're buying these for a child or teenager, don't bother. I've had Turtle Beaches in the past and all have fit and have been somewhat comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Gaming headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a christmas present for my son who is a keen gamer. He is very happy with these headphones. Sound is very good and they are comfortable to wear. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: cazann29

customer_reviews.title: Great design! Slight flaw...
customer_reviews.text: I use this headset for gaming on my 'xbox one s'. The overall quality of the product is awesome with a compfy design and great sound quality, I could certainly feel the change from my last headset. This is great for the money with great build quality. The reason I give the product 4 out 5 stars is because, after wearing for longer periods of time (around 1 hour) can become uncomfortable but I find if I take it off for a couple minutes it is comfortable again.
customer_reviews.author: Sam R

customer_reviews.title: Wired audio but needs to be charged or run 2 wires!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are a pain... They are wired for audio but need to be charged to be used.. Also need seperate splitter for PC... Would not reccommend... Not fully wireless and not fully wired or else 2 wires needed..... Stupid design
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic headset
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic headset Great sound quality and a very welcomed Christmas gift. The semi wireless feature works really well without the problems of Bluetooth conectivity that you hear in other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Cazzy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome headset, great sound, very clear, comfortable to wear, cool mic controls. Only downer is they need to be recharged, my own fault for not spotting it in info
customer_reviews.author: Oya

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic but painful wearing headset
customer_reviews.text: The headset is fantastic for Xbox one the only issue is that if you use it for a long time the headset very much hurts your ears. The sound from it though is amazing and it hasn’t actually broken when I pull it away from my controller like my last headset.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant sound
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my teen son, has used them for both Xbox and PC gaming and has said he’s blown away by the sound. The mic is nice a discreet doesn’t come to far over the cheek, the sound is clear and other players can hear you well too. Only snag is you don’t get any warning as to when the headset is low it just cuts off, doesn’t take too long to recharge.
customer_reviews.author: terri b.

customer_reviews.title: It needs charging
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, super comfortable, but you have to charge it. It's quite annoying to have a wire and still have to charge the headset, and one of the things that needs to be improved is that you should be able to use it without the need to charge
customer_reviews.author: CDog

customer_reviews.title: Broken and unusable after a few months
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for just a few months and now the connection that goes in to the Head Phones in loose inside and cuts out the sounds - You have to try and wiggle the part around to try and get sound back, however it does not work! It is exactly like what happens to the connection to a phone charger, where you have to try and move it around until it starts charging again - Very disappointed with this product and will not be buying this again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sounding headset but played up.
customer_reviews.text: It was good for around a day then started issues. Connectivity issues with the xbox1 and the microphone quality would change with the more i used it.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Superb upgrade
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them . Went to these from the original Sony blue tooth head phones and he says these are far better!
customer_reviews.author: SCos

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic price
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe the price I paid for this and my son is extremely impressed worth every Penny
customer_reviews.author: Sarahann

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Never had a real headset before. Really impressed, have already sent the link and recommended to friends. Like the flip mic up to mute feature. Sound is super clear.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Not the best headphones I've tried they dont hold enough of a charge and went all mad and crackliy after a few uses
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit I am a fan of TB headsets but the few I've had before this one are nothing in comparison. I found the sound quality to be far better than past headsets I've had, to the point where I literally can't hear anything outside of the headset, I love it! The microphone quality is also sublime, when online my friends can hear me clearly, no fuzz. Sound quality 5/5 Mic quality 5/5 For any console user this is a must buy, definitely!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Top quality
customer_reviews.text: A very comfortable set of headphones. I've been using them for a month now and the sound quality is unmatched by any others that I've tried. Excellent for FPS games as the surround sound easily let's you locate your opponents. I'd give these 6 out of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but questionable build quality
customer_reviews.text: Good sound and featured but not too comfy around my ears and the headset creeks and groans whenever I move my head but only on the left side
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming head set
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my boys 9th birthday for his switch. He loves them. Works well no problems.
customer_reviews.author: leahleo

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, poor build quality.
customer_reviews.text: Firstly the headset and mic sound brilliant, unfortunately after a few months of limited usage the plastic snapped on both sides of the headset. It certainly wasn't forced as I'm an adult and take care of things. And to top it off the connection to the Xbox controller is now causing sound issues with crackling. Wouldn't recommend I'm afraid.
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Read comment before you buy...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product as described. Comfortable when wearing glasses. The only downside is that the volume selectors are easily knocked/moved either when leaning back and resting one's head or when headphones are placed on a surface after use. Can be annoying, particularly if the headphone/mic levels have changed independently.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, but needs charging
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfy and have great surround sound quality, but it is annoying that wired headphones need to be charged! EDIT: After 8 months the wire has started to play up. Loud static is heard if I move my head to certain angles. Not up to Turtle Beach’s normal standards.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Quality.!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good headset. They fit quite snuggly around head. Great quality,and for this price ..perfect. They look the part as most T.Beach headsets do.
customer_reviews.author: Mr D Giles

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son for a gift but by the time I visited him and he used them they did not work he could only hear people speaking they could not hear him and the returns had no ast by this point. Can you advise what to do as these will be under manufacturing warranty but he has thrown away the box they come in also, is this something Amozon can resolve
customer_reviews.author: Glyn Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it we had it for a long time I'm and it was not working and descend a replacement very quick I'm very happy with this
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money great for kids
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality sound very well-made my son describes them as good as my beats headphones I’m not quite sure I believe him but he is very happy
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Turtle Beach (previous one lasted >4 years !!!) excellent quality and good balance between robust and weight. Excellent XBOX Performance if you follow manufacturer suggested settings
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Just brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them easy to use Sound control on left hand side, if buying them remember to turn off and charge them frequently (normal USB charger is okay) different options for for ps4 and x box 1 (don't have xbox so don't know works or not)
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bought for grandson he loves them only thing he keeps forgetting to turn them off!
customer_reviews.author: jane bettley

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones, no adapter for Xbox one controller :(
customer_reviews.text: Really like these, but - bear in mind I bought them for the Xbox one - they don’t come with an adapter - so they don’t plug straight into the controller - now that is annoying!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Thain

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Static noise, flimsy and not worth the money, go for the cheaper options
customer_reviews.author: Ipcress09

customer_reviews.title: Decent headset
customer_reviews.text: Very good headphones. Only downfall I would say is having to charge them they won't run off the power from the controller. Apart from that very good.
customer_reviews.author: samuel lowe

customer_reviews.title: No good unless charged.
customer_reviews.text: Who on earth would design earphones that needs a charged up battery to work! If these were wireless I could understand it but they aren't.
customer_reviews.author: Tony W.

customer_reviews.title: not working !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: i buy stealth 300x its not working out of the box !!! and not charging at all !!! buy stealth 600 better and more comfortable ...

customer_reviews.title: Superb budget headphones
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quick and work great. Good sound quality and work well playing COD

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous item very sturdy and great quality sound, 100% worth the money

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, you have to charge it constantly (even though its wired) and the battery doesn't last long. Most of the time I have to use my old crappy mic because sometimes I can't hear other people im in a party with but they can hear me. Without a doubt the worst pair of headphones I've purchased unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Lee  Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Buyers remorse
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Son for Xbox he didnt like something about the mic...distorts the voice. I use them on my mobile & sound is gd for me!

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: A very good well made head set, sound is very clear and most important grandson loves them.
customer_reviews.author: rodders

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: Great Headset... for about 4/5 weeks. Bought as a gift for my youngest brother so he could talk to his friends on his xbox. Now the headset wire is faulty and makes a terrible buzzing sound. Cant afford to buy another as its pretty expensive. So not only have I wasted money but now my little brother cant communicate with his friends and he feels left out again.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is made up with these brilliant performance sound brilliant they look nice easy to install

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Xmas gift Broken within 3 weeks!! The end has completely snapped off and cannot plug them into anything now
customer_reviews.author: flag friend

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: Fist of, the mic is good, my friends can hear my voice okay, the sound quality is not great, for 50 pounds it’s okay. BUT they are so uncomfortable after 30 mins. They are fine. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price, just not quite load enough
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Quality sound - a little heavy
customer_reviews.text: Good product with good sound for the price - if you want the real deal I’d invest in something a bit pricier
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Price was awesome
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter absolutely loves her new headphones there’s nothing she can find to gripe about them
customer_reviews.author: Pathricia

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, could improve on sturdiness
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Comfortable headset you could wear it for hours, good battery life. However, they could be more sturdy for the price paid. Similar headsets for the same price have much better materials.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality sounding head set
customer_reviews.text: Head set was for my 12 yrs old boy he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: ben brooks

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable, buzzes and can't change volume properly
customer_reviews.text: The over ear portion of it is rather small and tight making it pretty uncomfortable. Feedback on the mic. Inability to change voice to game levels, atleast mine aren't working if it's a feature. All in all, feels pretty shoddy, really dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Simon G.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable fantastic sound, the charging cable is not very long. Otherwise best headset ive bought well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kopthis

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The mic quality isn't as good as it makes out but it's okay. Just a bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: RaptorEchoSquad

customer_reviews.title: Help me out
customer_reviews.text: Was fine until today when the microphone itself has stopped working however it still outputs sound. I want a full refund or an exchange because I haven’t done anything to cause it to break and there is no physical damage visible.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: really good headset :)
customer_reviews.text: overall a really good quality headset, although the mic quality isn’t amazing, it’s still a super product. really comfy, the only downside that i could find (not really a downside if you’re not an idiot like me) is when i wore it for about 6 hours straight it did start to make my head hurt lmao.
customer_reviews.author: Megs

product_meta.title: Turtle Beach Stealth 300P Gaming Headset - PS4, PS5, Nintendo Switch & PC
product_meta.description:
Size Name:Stealth 300PThe Turtle Beach Stealth 300 is the latest amplified stereo gaming headset for PlayStation 4. The Stealth 300 gaming headset delivers powerful game and chat audio through large 50mm over-ear speakers and Turtle Beach's renowned high-sensitivity flip-to-mute mic. For added durability and unmatched comfort, the Stealth 300 dawns a metal-reinforced frame with Turtle Beach's unique ProSpecs glasses friendly design, along with a breathable fabric-wrapped headband and memory foam ear cushions. Additionally, the Stealth 300 offers Variable Mic Monitoring so you can hear and adjust the volume of your voice inside the headset to avoid shouting at other players, plus audio presets including Bass Boost, and a rechargeable battery that delivers over 30-hours of gaming per use.

BOX CONTAINS
Turtle Beach Stealth 300 Gaming Headset, Micro USB Charging Cable, Quick Start Guide and Turtle Beach Sticker
feature_bullets: Flip-up Mic - Turtle Beach's renowned high-sensitivity mic picks up your voice loud and clear, and flips up to mute
Glasses Friendly - Unique ProSpecs comfort-driven design removes pressure on your glasses while you play.
Memory Foam Ear Cushions - Breathable fabric-wrapped memory foam ear cushions provide unmatched comfort.
Audio Presets - Customize the way your game sounds with four audio presets, including Bass Boost.
Variable Mic Monitoring - Hear and adjust the volume of your voice inside the headset so you never have to shout.
Please ensure to have the updated firmware
